WORK_TOGETHER.DESCRIPTION_1: I am a frontend developer based in Munich. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position.
WORK_TOGETHER.DESCRIPTION_2: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!

MY_WORK.H2: Take a look at some of my projects here and interact with them to see my skills in action.

MY_PROJECTS.PROJECTS_1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.'
MY_PROJECTS.PROJECTS_2: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.PRIVACY_3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
